div.p: D.S.H. designed the research, wrote the manuscript and performed the data analysis. D.S.H., S.H., J.O.K. and K.S.C. developed the manuscript. D.S.H. and K.J.P. performed GLOMAP model simulations. S.H. and L.P.N. performed SIMFIRE-BLAZE model simulations. J.O.K. performed LMfire simulations. C.E.S. performed radiative forcing calculations. All authors commented on data analysis and contributed to the manuscript.
